sqlMap.select: SELECT 'TEST'||TRUNC((ROWNUM+1)/2) AS GROUP_FLAG , MOD(GUBUN, 2) AS GUBUN , '10' AS TOT_CNT , 10000*GUBUN AS TOT_AMT , GUBUN AS TOT_PERSON , '1' AS RE_CNT , 100*GUBUN AS RE_AMT , 0 AS NOT_GOOD_CNT , 0 AS NOT_GOOD_PERSON , 0 AS CHG_CNT , 500*GUBUN AS CHG_AMT , GUBUN AS WARN_CNT , 0 AS CHGGOOD_CNT , GUBUN AS BAD_CNT , GUBUN AS CALL_CNT , GUBUN AS CALL_PERSON , 0 AS POLICE_CNT , 0 AS POLICE_PERSON FROM ( SELECT LEVEL AS GUBUN FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 10 )

SELECT 'TEST'||TRUNC((ROWNUM+1)/2) AS GROUP_FLAG , MOD(GUBUN, 2) AS GUBUN , '10' AS TOT_CNT , 10000*GUBUN AS TOT_AMT , GUBUN AS TOT_PERSON , '1' AS RE_CNT , 100*GUBUN AS RE_AMT , 0 AS NOT_GOOD_CNT , 0 AS NOT_GOOD_PERSON , 0 AS CHG_CNT , 500*GUBUN AS CHG_AMT , GUBUN AS WARN_CNT , 0 AS CHGGOOD_CNT , GUBUN AS BAD_CNT , GUBUN AS CALL_CNT , GUBUN AS CALL_PERSON , 0 AS POLICE_CNT , 0 AS POLICE_PERSON FROM ( SELECT LEVEL AS GUBUN FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 10 )
